layout.name: shootLengthChange
layout.title: Shoot Length Change
layout.tooltip: How much the length changes when the pipe is aimed.

layout.name: shootRotation
layout.title: Shoot Rotation
layout.tooltip: The angle (in degrees, clockwise) that the player is shot out at.

layout.name: force
layout.title: Force
layout.tooltip: The amount of speed the player gets from being shot out (in pixels per frame).

layout.name: noMounts
layout.title: No Mounts
layout.tooltip: Whether or not boots and yoshies are allowed into the pipe.

layout.name: noHeldNPCs
layout.title: No Items
layout.tooltip: Whether or not NPC's held by the player are allowed into the pipe.
